ModMetaData.name: Picnic Area
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img]
Mod that adds a picnic-area for pawns to eat in. If they do, they will not get the "Ate without table-debuff" Inspired by the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1528586050]Picnic Spot[/url] mod by cucumpear
Settings for time of day and temperature Pawns will not picnic if its bad weather Picnic area needs seating but not tables If conditions are met and there are regular dining-areas available there is a 50% chance that they will eat at a picnic-area. If there are no available dining-areas they will always try to eat outside, if the conditions are met.
Chinese translation added by HawnHan
